name: Free For All
description:
What do you think is the most important thing in life?
money? honor? love? or something else? everything is fine Please enjoy this adventure according to your values.

Various races live in harmony in this world. They work hard every day with their own purpose.
Become a part of this world too, adventure in their world and fulfill your purpose.

1. Game progress.
The game consists of a tutorial chapter and one chapter.
Each chapter has its own main story and sub story. Depending on that, there are various quests or items.
In the tutorial chapter, you can naturally learn the core features of the game and infer the story of chapter 1 by doing quests.
Additionally, upon successful completion of the tutorial, you will receive several items, stats, and reputation.
In Chapter 1, you can freely adventure according to your values.
As you progress through the adventure in Chapter 1, you will naturally approach the main story, so you will never forget what the main story is.

2. Features of the game.
There are two ways to defeat monsters in this world.
There is a way to kill monsters by attacking, and a way to expel monsters by letting them go.
Depending on how you defeat monsters, there may be changes in the rewards or reputation you get, so you can choose according to your needs.

You can get important clues for exploring this world through the conversation function with NPCs, and you can acquire various rewards or change your reputation through the quest function.
In addition, various items can be acquired through transactions with NPCs with shop functions.
Choose carefully as the story of each chapter progresses through interactions with these NPCs.

Types of items include equipment items, consumption items, and other items.
Equipment items are classified into weapons (swords, axes, daggers), sub-weapons, hats, tops, bottoms, gloves, and shoes.
Animations vary depending on the weapon category. Also, there are various advantages and disadvantages.
There are equipment items that have set effects. If you meet the conditions of the set effect, you will get additional stats and reputation.
Equipment items can be enhanced to adjust their stats and reputation.
Consumption items are classified into recovery potions, temporary buff potions, permanent buff potions, reinforcement books, and gift boxes.
Other items are all items that are not equipment items and consumption items.

Important factors that affect gameplay include your level, stats, reputation, and quest progress.

Reputation has been added in addition to levels and abilities, which are indispensable elements of RPGs.
There are various races in this world, and there is a reputation (overall reputation) and a reputation for each race.
Depending on this reputation, there are restrictions on numerous functions such as using items and performing quests.
Regardless of reputation, the main story progresses, but the conditions for clearing the main story quest will change, so be careful.

There are various conditions such as chained quests, opposing quests, required stats, and required reputation as conditions for performing quests.
This is a game where quests are important. If you perform some quests, you may not be able to perform other quests, so you need to choose carefully.

Monster dictionary function is supported. It doubles as a kind of challenge or monster information.
In the Monster Dictionary function, you can unlock the monster and check the monster's information.
The way to unlock the monster is to kill a certain amount of the monster.

All game data is saved to the user's local storage every minute.
This will be used later when loading the game.

Various UIs are provided.
It provides stat and equipment window, item window, quest window, reputation window, monster dictionary window, in-game notification window, quick slot window, log window, and option window.
In the Ability and Equipment window, you can check the status and status of the equipment you are wearing in detail.
In the item window, you can check all the items you own.
You can check your reputation in the Reputation window.
In the Monster Dictionary window, you can check the level of unlocking the monster dictionary and various information.
You can check various log records in the in-game notification window.
The quick slot window supports quick use of items.
In the case of equipment items, item switching is possible, and in the case of consumption items, it is possible to use them. For other items, only simple quantity confirmation is possible.
In the log window, you can check various log records.
In the options window, you can set the resolution, sound settings, and exit the game.
